name: PKAddSecureElementPassViewController
desc: A view controller that manages the addition of secure element payment passes.

items.name: class func canAddSecureElementPass(configuration: PKAddSecureElementPassConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether PassKit can create a Secure Element pass using the specified configuration.
